place_of_publication.publication_title: Abh. Math.-Phys. Cl. Königl. Bayer. Akad. Wiss.

taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Greek komaros, arbutus, and staphyle, cluster of grapes, alluding to resemblance of fruit clusters to those of Arbutus unedo]

bio:treatment.discussion: Arctostaphylos Adanson sect. Comarostaphylis (Zuccarini) A. Gray; Arctostaphylos subg. Comarostaphylis (Zuccarini) A. Gray

references.reference: Diggs, G. M. 1987. Numerical systematics of Comarostaphylis (Arbuteae, Ericaceae). Syst. Bot. 12: 586–600.
Diggs, G. M. 1995. Comarostaphylis. In: Organization for Flora Neotropica. 1968+. Flora Neotropica. 98+ nos. New York. No. 66, pp. 146–193.
